pageTitle: Océ VarioPrint 6200 Ultra+ Black and White Digital Presses - Canon Solutions America
textBeforeTable: Specifications Three product lines/ four speeds for the best printing performance to fit the environment Environmentally sustainable performance Non-stop production for up to four hours Offset-like quality with dazzling image resolution Near-perfect sheet position and registration Field upgradeable speed licenses (temporary or permanent) Océ Gemini technology for ultra-high volume duplex printing performance Blaze through tough duplex volumes with ultra-speed: Features Drivers & Downloads Brochures & Manuals Specifications Features Océ Gemini Instant Duplexing Technology uses a single engine to drive two imaging belts that print both sides of the page in a single pass. As a result, duplex jobs print faster and more reliably. With the Océ VarioPrint 6000 Ultra+, TP+ and MICR+ Lines, you can offer customers
